name: Heck it!
description:
You you are a robot that helps hackers stole data, your goal is to get three flash drives and plug them into main computer to win, but you have to carry only one at time and platforms behind you will fall, so think before you act! 

forgot to mention Trino for 2d shadows asset (: . Sorry for that

FULLSCREEN FOR BETTER EXPERIENCE!

- Controls

A,D to move, 

Space to jump, 

E to interact

R to go to the menu
